name: ByteNite
description: ByteNite empowers busy developer teams with a fully-managed serverless container platform, streamlining cloud infrastructure to save 50% in time and cost. Our solution accelerates processes across AI inference, ETL, and more, enhancing performance and efficiency.
one_liner: ByteNite empowers busy developer teams with a fully-managed serverless container platform, streamlining cloud infrastructure to save 50% in time and cost. Our solution accelerates processes across AI inference, ETL, and more, enhancing performance and efficiency.
